body:
Comment 4: 
It's very annoying when you go get somepkg and you just want to run 'godoc
somepkg Foo' and every time you ask godoc to tell you something about
somepkg it also tells you about some random test bug that you don't care
about. Yes, it may be a bug. But if I am running godoc and not the package
author, I do not care. It's noise.
